message: I just noticed that following a URL of the form https://convore.com/join/[group name]/ will make you automatically join that group.  Links aren't supposed to change state, and this makes it easy to spam people and have them join groups without their consent.  Best practice for this functionality is to have a page at the end of links like that asking people to confirm that they want to join the group.  Not a big issue at the moment, but when Convore gets bigger, it's going to be a problem.
